name: Zero Waste Challenge
description: Join our community-wide challenge to adopt zero-waste practices in your daily life. Learn how to reduce, reuse, and recycle to minimize your environmental impact.
title: Zero Waste Challenge Kickoff

name: Farmers Food Festival
description: Celebrate local agriculture and sustainable farming practices at our Farmers Food Festival. Enjoy fresh produce, culinary demonstrations, and learn about supporting local farmers.
title: Farmers Food Festival

name: Free Cooking Classes
description: Participate in our free cooking classes and enhance your culinary skills. Learn how to prepare delicious meals using surplus ingredients and reduce food waste in your kitchen.
title: Creative Cooking Workshop
